DOC.brief_title: Etiology Outcomes Tropical Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective observational study 64 patient ARDS recruit . Written inform consent take prior inclusion study . Study conduct Medical ICU ( C2 ICU ) AIIMS . Based medical history physical examination , radiology , biochemical microbiological investigation etiology ARDS decided.Sample take te eime admission estimation inflammatory marker hsCRP , IL-1.IL-6 , TNF , Procalcitonin.From available variable APACHE II , Sequential organ failure assessment score ( SOFA ) , Simplified acute physiological score ( SAPS ) II 3 calculate assess severity ARDS.All patient give mechanical ventilation use protocol follow ARDS Network low-tidal volume ventilation strategy.The data register ICU admission every 24 hr . Day 0 define interval time ICU admission 8:00 next day .Every day data record fixed time 9 . It include Tidal volume Vt ( ml/kg ) , respiratory rate/min , Minute ventilation ( l/min ) , FiO2 , PaO2/FiO2 , Inspiratory flow ( I : E ) , Ppeak ( cm H2O ) , Static respiratory compliance ( ml/cm water ) .Plateau pressure ( Pplat ) , Peak end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) .Patient monitor throughout course illness outcome ARDS assess .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects fulfil criterion ARDS accord AmericanEuropean consensus definition 2 . Admitted medical ICU ( CII/CU ) 3 . No know previous lung pathology e.g . bronchiectasis , Interstitial lung disease 1 . HIV positive serology . 2 . Chronic obstructive airway disease 3 . Not give consent study 4 . Known lung pathology
